Description: For sale today is my absolutely fabulous Gibson SG “Kirk Douglas” Roots Custom I REALLY hate to see this one go, but finances are what they are… Here is the Gibson description page for the Kirk Douglas SG: The Gibson data page for the Kirk Douglas SG These are almost impossible to find in really great condition. I am the first owner: it was purchased new, pre-order from my local dealer. I have certainly played it over the years. So it has smudges, and little tiny pick marks (I mostly play finger-style, but do occasionally use a pick). I have ONLY played this guitar in my home studio by me… It is in truly wonderful condition. I will easily call it a 9.6 out of 10 condition, as it was made by humans and played by a human. The case is in 9.5 out of 10 condition. This guitar is sold as-is. It is in great shape and has been in a good environment. However, returns are ONLY available for “not described correctly.” Collectors? Do you want a 10? This isn’t a 10. It is really a 9.6… SHIPPING Shipping: Shipping is actual cost (I don't add 'and handling" to the charge). I do NOT participate in the eBay global shipping program for this guitar as it has Rosewood. I will ship either UPS or USPS Priority Mail, whichever works best for my abilities. Shipping notes: I work a full-time job as a software engineer. Music and gear are my passions (outside my family). I list 3 days processing time because sometimes I have to do something for work, work late, do something for my family, or similar. I have to wrap up your gear at night after work and get it down to our local shipper (Office Depot) as quickly as is possible. Sometimes, I can ship out within 24 hours, sometimes it takes a couple of BUSINESS days. I really do strive hard to do a good job for you. I want you to enjoy my gear, too! Returns: I'm selling my gear to bring money into my home. I am not a business and I don't have a monetary reserve to offer multi-thousand-dollar returns.
Title: Gibson Kirk Douglas SG MINTY with OHSC and ALL Original...
ConditionDescription: The guitar is easily 9.6 out of 10. The case is 9.5 out of 10 with some dust here and there...
